titles.title: Moving H-2A to United States Department of Agriculture Act of 2020
Moving H-2A to United States Department of Agriculture Act of 2020
To transfer the administration of the H-2A program from the Secretary of Labor to the Secretary of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

bill.summary:
Moving H-2A to United States Department of Agriculture Act of 2020
This bill moves administration of the H-2A (temporary agricultural workers) program from the Department of Labor to the Department of Agriculture and transfers various program-related responsibilities from the Department of Justice to the Department of Homeland Security.
